core.name: Void Throne
core.description:
Leader Bonus:
Law of the Void: Team gains 30% Crit DMG and 10% Crit Rate.

subskills.name: Boundless Realm
subskills.description: Upon entry, Herrscher Charge restores to 120.

subskills.name: Void Throne
subskills.description: Team gains 40% Crit DMG and 15% Crit Rate.

subskills.name: Spatial Collapse
subskills.description: In Herrscher form, Space Core explosion deal 18.0% bonus Physical DMG and 24.0% further bonus damage to shields.

core.name: Charge: Time Tremor
core.description:
With at least 240 Herrscher Charge, tap and hold the [ATK] button during the 5-sequence Basic ATK to unleash Charged ATK (snap her fingers).
Herrscher Charge maxes at 480. Each Space Core summoned recovers 60 Herrscher Charge. Charged attack: Temporary Time Prison to the target and deals 600% ATK of Large AOE Physical DMG, and activates Herrscher Form.
Full Herrscher Charge: Deal an extra 400% ATK of Extra-large AOE Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Rift Geyser
subskills.description: Explosion at the Space Core summon position gains 50.0% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Distortion
subskills.description: Charged attacks gain 60.0% Total DMG Multiplier against unshielded enemies.

subskills.name: Dimension Warp
subskills.description: When QTE ends, gain 60 Herrscher Charge and 20.0% bonus ATK Speed for 10s.

core.name: Passive Skill
core.description:
Passive bonuses apply automatically.
Herrscher Form: Consumes 24 Herrscher Charge every 0.5s. Can move rapidly during attack. Can perform 2 consecutive evasions. Slightly gains Interrupt and Ignore Interrupt. The AOE of Space Core explosion extends.
Basic ATK under Herrscher Form becomes a 3-sequence ATK:
1st Sequence: 3x50% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: 4x50% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: Inflicts short Time Prison on the target; explosion epicenter pulls in enemies within a small AOE, dealing 80%+6x50% ATK of large AOE Physical DMG and summoning a Space Core at the enemy's position.

subskills.name: Law of the Void
subskills.description: Each repeated attack against one single target (and hits no other enemies) gains 1% Crit Rate (max: 20%). Law of the Void resets if not attacking for 3s or switching target.

subskills.name: Deviant Energy
subskills.description: For every 1 Space Core summoned, character takes 15.0% less Indirect DMG for 10s. Max stacks: 3. Each stack resets the duration.

subskills.name: Honkai Mark
subskills.description: Charged ATK marks the enemy for 10s. Attacks by the Herrscher of the Void against marked enemies gain 15.0% Total DMG (independent effect).

core.name: Void Unleashed
core.description:
Tears open the space-time fabric to unleash a barrage of raw energy.
Deals 9-12 hits in a large AOE in front of the character, each hit dealing 300% ATK of Physical DMG and applies Time Lock to enemies within a large AOE around the character for 3s.
SP cost: 125

subskills.name: QTE: Angel of Destruction
subskills.description: QTE: Triggers upon shieldbreak or when an enemy is affected by Time Slow. Deals 10x100% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Judgment
subskills.description: Void Unleashed hits gain 30.0% Crit Rate against enemies above 50% HP and gain 50.00% Total DMG against enemies below 50% HP.

core.name: Phase Shuttle
core.description:
Shuttle through the space-time fabric to evade enemy attacks.
Ultimate Evasion summons a Space Core and triggers a local Time Slow, stopping enemy action within the AOE for 3s. CD: 20s.
After evasion, tap the [Attack] button within a short time period to deal the 3rd strike of the 5th Basic ATK sequence.

subskills.name: Void Lock
subskills.description: When there are enemies along the path of Phase Shuttle, Ultimate Evasion effects will trigger without Ultimate Evasion conditions. Shortens Phase Shuttle CD by 3.0s.

subskills.name: Gegenstrom
subskills.description: For every enemy affected by Time Slow, the Valkyrie gains 10.0% Physical DMG for 10s. Max stacks: 3.

subskills.name: Suspended Space
subskills.description: When local Time Slow ends, trigger Time Fracture for 2.0s.

core.name: Subspace Lance
core.description:
Rapid 5-sequence attack.
1st Sequence: 60% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: 2x40% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: Small AOE 150% ATK of Physical DMG, and summons a Space Core (summoned entity) at the enemy's position.
4th Sequence: 3x40% ATK of Physical DMG.
5th Sequence: Inflicts short Time Prison on the target enemy. Explosion epicenter pulls in enemies in small AOE. Deals 80%+6x40% ATK of Large AOE Physical DMG and summons a Space Core at the enemy's position.
Space Core explodes after being summoned, dealing 100% ATK of Physical DMG (DMG calculations based on Herrscher of the Void's stats).

subskills.name: Weltraum Richter
subskills.description: In Herrscher Form: Gains 30.0% Total DMG, and further gains 30% Total DMG against MECH-type enemies.

subskills.name: Contortion Effect
subskills.description: During Herrscher Form: Explosion at the Space Core summon position deals 350.0% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Dimension Overload
subskills.description: During Herrscher Form: Last hit of the Basic ATK sequence will also slowly pull-in enemies within a 10.0-meter radius.
